questions.question: When your chains were informed of the competitive exclusivity test, what was their reaction/comment? Please be specific and list examples if possible
When your independent stores were informed of the competitive exclusivity test, what was their reaction/comments? (Please be specific and list examples if possible)
questions.response: VERY LITTLE REACTION FROM RETAILERS. THEY WERE NOT CONCERNED ABOUT THE LACK OF LORILLARD

questions.question: Do you feel the exclusivity test will benefit or have a negative impact on Lorillard business (Please Explain)?
questions.response: IT MAY HAVE SOME NEGATIVE IMPACT ON HARLEY AND SALE BECAUSE WE SEEM DEPENDENT ON COUPONS/STICKERS FOR SALES. PROBABLY WILL NOT AFFECT NEWPORT

questions.question: Any other comments, suggestions or problems?
questions.response: THE OVERALL EFFECT ON STYLE AND HARLEY MAY NOT BE VERY GREAT SINCE WE HAVE LIMITED DISTRIBUTION ON BOTH BRANDS WHERE WE DO NOT HAVE A MERCHANDISING AGREEMENT
